divs: Sighting Detailsi saw a large glowing ring in the northeast sky that was brighter than the streetlights and it got brighter and brighter. you could see the darkness through the middle of the ring then brightly illuminated spheres stared coming through the dark area out of the center. looked like a stargate or a porthole of some type.my roomate saw it too. This was not man made. I have a background in aiation and there were no civillian,commercial,or military lights. this was something else and it was real. I saw about 12 objects appear from the center of this disk.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Woodstock
There were no other sightings in Woodstock on or around February 13th 2009
Summary: UFO stargate illuminated ring that glowing balls came out of.
